extension_refused_request_extension_desc: This is for one of the following reasons:
you have reached the limit for the number of extensions you can request
extension_refused_request_description: You should verify your identity and provide your personal code and verification statement as soon as possible, even if your deadline has already passed.
extension_refused_request_guidance_1: For information on how to do this,
extension_refused_request_guidance_2: read the guidance on verifying your identity for Companies House.
